fallout.description: [BOOT] SUBJECT BORN. VITAL SIGNS STABLE. INITIALIZING LIFESTREAM...
[MOVE] RELOCATION PROTOCOL EXECUTED. DESTINATION: TEHRAN SECTOR.
[ENROLL] ACADEMIC ENROLLMENT: KEYHAN MODULE. DATA ACQUISITION COMMENCED.
[CODE] COGNITIVE AWAKENING. UI/UX MALICE DETECTED. XP SYSTEM ENGAGED.
[GRAD] EDUCATIONAL PHASE COMPLETE. DIPLOMA SECURED. SECTOR EXIT GRANTED.
[ACCESS] HIGHER COGNITION FACILITY ACCESSED: SRBIAU NODE CONNECTED.
[ERR] GLOBAL SYSTEM ERROR. CORE PROCESSES SUSPENDED. DOWNTIME INITIATED.
[ANALYSIS] SYSTEM ARCHITECTURE PEAKED. EXISTENTIAL LOGIC OVERRIDE ACTIVE.
[ALERT] EXTERNAL SYSTEM INTERFERENCE DETECTED. POLITICAL STATIC RISE.
[REFACTOR] CORE IDENTITY REFACTORING. MAJOR VERSION UPGRADE IN PROGRESS.
[DEPLOY] INTERFACE SPECIALIST ASSIGNED. SECTOR: FRONTEND DEVELOPMENT.
[CMD] COMMAND CENTER ESTABLISHED. DEPLOYING GLOBAL SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS.
[ALERT] FIREWALL BREACH DETECTED. PERSISTENT EXTERNAL INTERFERENCE.

personal.description: got introduced to programming in school, had this science competition and i wanted the powerpoint to have a timer (for bad UX, aka give oponents anxiety) and a menu with locks to open the stages and their XP.
started studying CS in SRBIAU university.
my interest in systems started to peak plus philosophy.
made this website, then got inspored by shinmera to make this section.
started working as a frontend developer.
running an agency for software solutions.
more govermental issues, this one kinda hurt me
